topic: 他们是从美国来的吗？

options.label: Are they from America?
Do they from America?

topic: 他的女朋友住在波兰吗？

options.label: Is his girlfriend live in Poland?
Is his girlfriend living in Poland?

topic: 你在哪儿工作？

options.label: Where do you work?
Where does you work?

topic: 我是老师，我教中文。

options.label: I am a teacher, I teach Chinese.
I am a teacher. I teach Chinese.

topic: 这些孩子喜欢住在城市。

options.label: These children like to live in the city.
These childs like living in the city.

topic: 萨姆经常来看你吗？

options.label: Does Sam often come to see you?
Does Sam often come see you?

topic: 碧和露西在同一所学校读书吗？

options.label: Do Bea and Lucy study at the same school?
Do Bea and Lucy read the same books at school?

topic: 她认为帮助他人是一项最完美的工作。

options.label: She thinks helping others is the most perfect job.
She thinks helping others is a perfect job.

topic: 露西的工作是导游。

options.label: Lucy’s work is a tourist guide.
Lucy works as a tourist guide.

topic: 你家乡有电影院吗？

options.label: Does your hometown got a cinema?
Is there any cinema in your hometown?

topic: 这里没有火车站。

options.label: There is not a train station here.
Here is no train station.

topic: 客厅里有一个沙发和一把扶手椅。

options.label: There is a sofa and an armchair in the living room.
There are a sofa and an armchair in the living room.

topic: —你这是要去哪儿？—我要去超市。

options.label: — Where are you going? —I’m going to the supermarket.
— Where are you going? —I’m going to go to the supermarket.

topic: 请查一下火车什么时候开。

options.label: Please find out when will the train leave.
Please find out when the train leaves.

topic: 他收藏着不少外国硬币。

options.label: He has a very good collection of foreign coins.
He has collected many foreign coin.

topic: 去公园怎么样？

options.label: How about going to the park?
How about go to the park?

topic: 你能借我一把伞吗？

options.label: Can you lend me an umbrella?
Can you borrow me an umbrella?

topic: 玛丽穿着一件游泳衣。

options.label: Mary is putting on a swimming costume.
Mary is wearing a swimming costume.

topic: 我爸爸明早飞北京。

options.label: My father is flying to Beijing tomorrow morning.
My father is going to fly to Beijing tomorrow morning.

topic: 我们整夜打牌、讲故事打发时间。

options.label: We passed the night playing cards and telling stories all night.
We passed the night play cards, tell stories all night.

topic: 晚上七点半爸爸在火车站接我们。

options.label: My father met us at the railway station at about 7:30.
My father received us at the railway station at about 7:30.

topic: 我昨晚睡得很晚。

options.label: I slept very late yesterday night.
I slept very late last night.

topic: 经验是最好的老师。

options.label: Experience is the best teacher.
Experience is the most good teacher.

topic: 我从不说谎。

options.label: I never tell a lie.
I have never told a lie.

topic: 有人在敲门。

options.label: Someone is knocking the door.
Someone is knocking at the door.

topic: 我每年回去看望父母两到三次。

options.label: I go home to visit my parents two or three times a year.
I go home to visit my parents twice or three times a year.

topic: 书桌靠墙放着。

options.label: The desk is opposite the wall.
The desk is against the wall.

topic: 你不许在这里过马路。

options.label: You need not cross the road here.
You must not cross the road here.

topic: 我们一起去那里吧！

options.label: Let’s go there together!
Lets go there together!

topic: 努力工作多年后，他们买了自己的房子，并且搬了进去。

options.label: After many years’ hard work, they afforded to buy their own house and moved into it.
After many years’ hard work, they afforded to buy their own house, moved into it.

topic: 你不应该忘记说谢谢你。

options.label: You should not forget to say “thank you”.
You should not forget saying “thank you”.

topic: 我应该把这件事情告诉他吗？

options.label: Must I tell him about it?
Should I tell him about it?

topic: 我不得不每天很早就起床。

options.label: I have to get up very early in the morning every day.
I must get up very early in the morning every day.

topic: 你不可以对别人这么粗鲁。

options.label: You can’t be so rude to other people.
You are not able to be so rude to other people.

topic: 你想喝一点牛奶吗？

options.label: Do you want to drink a little milk?
Would you like a little milk?

topic: 她爱吃甜食，每天都吃几粒糖果。

options.label: She has got a sweet tooth and eats a few sweets every day.
She loves eating sweets and eats a few sweets every day.

topic: 你可以尽你最大的努力，但不保证会成功。

options.label: You can try your best, however, success is not guaranteed.
You can try your best, but success is not guaranteed.

topic: 《哈利·波特》成为今年奥斯卡大奖的赢家，这并不奇怪。

options.label: Harry Potter is not a surprise winner at this year’s Oscar Awards.
Harry Potter becomes the biggest winner at this year’s Oscar Awards, it is not a surprise.

topic: 玛吉不打算参加我们的体育俱乐部。

options.label: Margie isn’t going to join our sports club.
Margie isn’t going to join up our sports club.

topic: 你曾梦想过成为一名科学家吗？

options.label: Have you ever dreamed of becoming a scientist?
Do you ever dream of becoming a scientist?

topic: 这家小酒馆既提供餐食，也提供酒水。

options.label: This pub supplies meals and drinks, too.
This pub serves meals as well as drinks.

topic: 你去过西班牙吗？

options.label: Have you ever been to Spain?
Did you go to Spain?

topic: 她深受学生喜爱。

options.label: She is popular with students.
She is loved deeply by students.

topic: 火车十分钟前就到了。

options.label: The train has arrived ten minutes ago.
The train arrived ten minutes ago.

topic: 他们只有受到邀请时才会来。

options.label: They will only come if they are invited.
They will come if only they are invited.

topic: 我们在背单词上花费太多的时间。

options.label: We spend too much time learning words by heart.
We waste too much time on learning words by heart.

topic: 当遇到生词时，我经常查英语词典。

options.label: When I come across a new word, I often check an English dictionary.
When I come across a new word, I often consult an English dictionary.

topic: 你昨晚睡得好吗？

options.label: Did you sleep well last night?
Do you sleep well last night?

topic: 比起他的真名，他的笔名更是众所周知。

options.label: As for his real name, his pen name was more known.
He was better known for his pen name than for his real name.

topic: 他从国外归来后才在一所高校任教师。

options.label: He did not work as a teacher in a university until he came back from abroad.
He worked as a teacher in a university after he came back from abroad.
